from sys_entity_user b left join sys_map_user_role c on c.user_id = b.id left join sys_map_role_permission d on d.role_id = c.role_id left join sys_entity_permission a on a.id = d.permission_id where b.username = #{0} group by a.id -- 避免重复获取同一权限
